english.segment1: Carry my world. In Your nail-scarred hands, Breathing Your hope. And Your life in me.
english.segment2: No more than a heartbeat away, No more than a heartbeat away. Whereever I go, I know that You're there, No more than a heartbeat away.
english.segment3: Closer than my dreams, Lord, I know You. You're near me, You're near me. Your everlasting arms, They surround me. You hold me, You hold me.
english.segment4: Every word I pray, Lord, You listen, My Savior, You heard me, Watching over me. Every moment. You keep me, You keep me.
english.segment5: (BRIDGE). You'll never leave me. Without You. You'll never leave me alone.You'll never leave me. Without You, "Cause I know. You'll always be there.
